body_html: @F3PiX can we make the conference raffle round an attribute of Season? Not that it has to switch automatically by date, but at least that way an organizer can update the global state of the app's behaviour without us having to trigger a git commit + deployment.
body_text: @F3PiX can we make the conference raffle round an attribute of Season? Not that it has to switch automatically by date, but at least that way an organizer can update the global state of the app's behaviour without us having to trigger a git commit + deployment.
body: @F3PiX can we make the conference raffle round an attribute of `Season`? Not that it has to switch automatically by date, but at least that way an organizer can update the global state of the app's behaviour without us having to trigger a `git commit` + deployment.
